Control Name: OPS 7.5 Make informed decisions to deploy systems and changes
Control Statement: Evaluate the capabilities of the team to support the workload and the workload's compliance with governance. Evaluate these against the beneﬁts of deployment when determining whether to transition a system or change into production. Understand the beneﬁts and risks to make informed decisions.

control_attributes.Control: OPS 7.5 Make informed decisions to deploy systems and changes
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you know that you are ready to support a workload?
